sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { TableLine, DoneIcon, UndoneIcon, TrashIcon, TableContentBox, TableContentBoxMiddle, TableContentBoxRight, DoneTextContainer, TextContainer, MessageContainer, } from './elements' const ListItem = ({ item, tickHandler, trashHandler }) => ( Id: {item.id} State: {item.state} Details Type: {item.type} Message: {item.text} ) export default ListItem
